bike.description: S-Works FACT 10m carbon, Az1 construction, semi-compact Tricross design, Zertz inserts, rack and fender fittings

components.description: S-Works FACT monocoque carbon Tricross fork; full carbon legs, crown and steerer w/ Speed Zertz, rack and fender fittings
S-Works Mindset, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, sealed cartridge ceramic bearings w/ stainless steel races, carbon 20mm cone w/ one 10mm and two 5mm carbon spacers
S-Works SL, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Chain stay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
